about_the_game:
After purchasing, you will get the support of redpillgo somatosensory equipment, which allows 3D characters to move freely through redpillgo somatosensory equipment.

Note: This product does not include redpillgo sensory equipment, if necessary, you can contact redpillgo's agent to purchase equipment; if there is no redpillgo sensory equipment, this DLC cannot be used normally.
detailed_description:
After purchasing, you will get the support of redpillgo somatosensory equipment, which allows 3D characters to move freely through redpillgo somatosensory equipment.

Note: This product does not include redpillgo sensory equipment, if necessary, you can contact redpillgo's agent to purchase equipment; if there is no redpillgo sensory equipment, this DLC cannot be used normally.
name: V-Skin redpillgo support Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Redpillgo Box
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Redpillgo Box
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. IOS IphoneX And Our FaceTracking Application

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
